title: BBC Local Live: Leeds and West Yorkshire on Thursday 10 November - BBC News
summary: fresh talks aimed at averting arriva bus strike .
ambitious new homes plan for leeds could be cut .
joint police force search launched for missing sex offender .
long delays for commuters after crash on m1 .
man found with serious head injuries in bradford .

documents.title: five things we learned today
text: that 's it from me for today , we 'll be back again tomorrow from 08:00 with more news , travel , weather and sport .
until then , here are five things we learned today :
see you tomorrow .
author: Nick Wilmshurst
BBC Local Live, Leeds

documents.title: police arrest two in van theft crackdown
text: if you were witness to a bit of police activity this afternoon in batley this is why :
the reason is that officers were performing what they call a `` tactical vehicle stop '' .
you may have seen it on those police tv programmes .
it 's where they surround a vehicle with their cars and bring it to a stop ,
west yorkshire police say this is the second one they performed today , both on stolen vans .
two people have been arrested .

documents.title: weather : forecast for tonight and tomorrow
text: scattered showers dying out tonight , becoming dry with clear periods .
minimum temperature -2c ( 28f ) with a widespread frost and fog patches .
any fog will be quite slow to clear tomorrow morning , otherwise a dry and bright day expected with sunny spells .
maximum temperature 8c ( 46f ) .
author: Paul Hudson
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: watch : black poppy wreaths to be laid in leeds
text: black poppy roses have been designed to mark the contribution of soldiers from african and caribbean countries during conflicts of the last century .
in 2016 , for the first time , wreaths of them will be laid at remembrance sunday services in leeds .
author: Abi Jaiyeola
Reporter, BBC Look North

documents.title: two teenagers hospitalised after robbery in dewsbury
text: two 16-year-old boys needed hospital treatment after being robbed in dewsbury market .
the incident happened after 20:30 on thursday 27 october .
the two victims were approached by a group of men and were hit until they fell to the floor .
the assault continued while they lay on the ground .
a gold samsung galaxy s6 edge phone , a hublot watch and cash were taken from them .

documents.title: jamie ellis : hull kr sign huddersfield giants half-back as five leave
text: relegated hull kr have signed huddersfield giants half-back jamie ellis on a season-long loan deal .
ellis , 27 , played 17 super league games in 2016 , scoring five tries .
meanwhile , albert kelly , mitch allgood , kevin larroyer , josh mantellato and john boudebza have all been released .

documents.title: travel update : problems in huddersfield
text: we 've got some very slow traffic on the a629 wakefield road in huddersfield .
it 's partially blocked eastbound between shorehead roundabout and the grosvenor road junction , because of a broken down lorry .
it 's leading to congestion on a62 southgate to the northumberland street junction .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: thousands sign petition against pool closure plan
text: thousands of people have signed petitions against plans to close swimming pools in castleford and knottingley .
author: Pontefract and Castleford Express

documents.title: poppy seller , 101 , 'luckiest man alive '
text: poppy seller , 101 , 'luckiest man alive '

documents.title: otley residents urged to rally behind lido project following vandal attack
text: new hoardings around otley 's former lido have been vandalised just weeks after being installed .
author: Ilkley Gazette
Ilkley Gazette

documents.title: two arrested for growing cannabis
text: two men have been arrested after a cannabis farm was discovered at a house in huddersfield .
after a tip-off from locals police swooped on the property on crosland road in thornton lodge on monday .
about 240 fully-grown plants were found which were ready for harvesting .
the two men , aged 21 and 28 , have been arrested on sus of the production of a controlled drug and immigration offences .
the drugs have now been sent for destruction and the farm has been dismantled .
thanks to information received from the local community , we have prevented a significant amount of cannabis from potentially being sold on our streets . ''

documents.title: leeds christmas light switch-on tonight
text: the christmas lights in leeds will be officially switched on at 18:45 tonight .
leeds-born triathletes ali and jonny brownlee and paralympian kadeena cox will be the guests of honour .
girl band stooshe will be providing the entertainment and you 'll also be able to have a go on some funfair rides too .
some bus services will be diverted .
you can see which ones are affected here .

documents.title: further talks in arriva dispute
text: earlier i was telling you about the planned 24-hour strike that bus drivers for arriva in west yorkshire are due to be taking part in .
well this afternoon we understand that further talks aimed at averting industrial action are due to take place tomorrow .
about 850 arriva drivers at depots in castleford , dewsbury , heckmondwike and wakefield are due to walk out at 03:00 on monday .

documents.title: chinese money to come to yorkshire ?
text: the government is trying to persuade chinese investors to fund big developments in yorkshire .
it wants foreign businesses to help bankroll five building projects - one of those is at kirkstall forge in leeds .
a new train station has already been built , but there are also plans for homes and office space .

documents.title: surgery could close because of lack of doctors
text: a doctors ' surgery in keighley could close because no gps can be found to run it .
today , patients get a chance to question officials about its future .
the north street surgery has about 6,700 patients but the current operator 's contract runs out at the end of the month - and there is n't a company willing to take it over .
staff have been told it could potentially close and if that happened , patients would have to go to one of the other four practices in the town , two of which we 're told are close to capacity .
the nhs says making sure all patients have access to a gp is a priority .

documents.title: weekend stargazers to enjoy biggest 'supermoon ' since 1948
text: if you 're up late on sunday night you could be in for an astronomical treat - a view of the biggest `` supermoon '' in 68 years .
on the night of the 13/14 november , the moon will come closer to earth than at any point since 1948 .
it will appear up to 30 % brighter and 14 % bigger than an average full moon , according to nasa .
it will be the brightest and largest of three `` supermoons '' to occur in 2016 .
the first came on 16 october 16 with the third due on 14 december .

documents.title: do n't get your moustache all soggy
text: they were a resourceful lot those georgians :
taking part in # movember , is your moustache stopping you from enjoying a brew ?
then you need a moustache cup - this example is dated c1790

documents.title: yorkshire 's 70,000 'lonely ' pensioners
text: yorkshire 's been named second only to london for loneliness among older people .
the silver line helpline says it 's received nearly nearly 70,000 calls from this region since it opened in 2013 .
almost 30,000 of those came from west yorkshire , putting this area at number four .

documents.title: 'help me bring my dad back home ' says daughter
text: a daughter is pleading for funds to help bring her father 's body home after he died in a hospital abroad .
author: Wakefield Express

documents.title: revised bus timetables published ahead of strike
text: on monday next week , hundreds of arriva bus drivers in west yorkshire are set for a 24-hour strike in a row over pay and shifts .
about 850 arriva drivers at depots in castleford , dewsbury , heckmondwike and wakefield are to walk out .
the strike is due to start at 03:00 on monday .
arriva has just released a list of the routes that will be affected and revised timetables .

documents.title: in rainbows over west yorkshire
text: earlier this morning we were treated to lots of sightings of rainbows across west yorkshire .
i would have shared them earlier but for the problems on the m1
still , at least it 's something nice to look at while you 're sitting in a 10-mile queue .
we start off in shipley :
and these two were taken in leeds :

documents.title: broadway shopping centre up for award
text: one of west yorkshire 's shopping centres is up for a national award .
bradford 's broadway centre , which has been open for a year , is yorkshire 's entry in the local authority building control awards in london later this month .
the centre 's been praised for the quality of its building work .

documents.title: joint police force search launched for missing sex offender
text: a sex offender has gone missing after failing to appear in court on wednesday to be sentenced for a number of sexual offences .
andrew robinson , 65 , failed to appear at newcastle crown court and was last seen in york yesterday morning .
he 's now believed to be in the ravenscar or whitby area and is believed to be carrying a large green rucksack .
officers from north yorkshire police are assisting west yorkshire police in the search , and anyone with information about his whereabouts is asked to get in touch as soon as possible .

documents.title: list of remembrance services in kirklees
text: if you 're in kirklees this weekend and are looking for somewhere to join in a remembrance service , kirklees council has just released this list .

documents.title: man found with serious head injuries in bradford
text: a man has been treated in hospital in bradford after suffering serious head injuries .
the 25-year-old , was found by a taxi driver on midland road at about 02:45 last saturday .
the man has now been released from hospital and officers are investigating how he came to be injured .

documents.title: let 's make leeds great again
text: this made me giggle : comedian justin moorhouse is appearing in leeds tonight :
tonight leeds the wardrobe me you let 's make leeds great again

documents.title: travel update : m1 begins to reopen
text: the northbound carriageway has now reopened on the m1 at j44-j45 , and the southbound now has just one lane closed after the earlier accident which damaged the central reservation .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: ambitious new homes plan for leeds could be cut
text: a target of 70,000 new homes to be built in leeds is set to be reduced - but it 'll take a public inquiry to get there .
the 70,000 figure was meant to be reached by 2028 , but has been called `` impossible '' by members of leeds city council 's opposition group .
the authority 's ruling labour group says the target , which has triggered campaigns against building plans in several parts of leeds , is being reviewed .

documents.title: travel update : problems on the m1
text: this is the reason thousands of motorists have been delayed this morning on the m1 , m62 and on various routes around garforth and rothwell .
earlier this morning a car crashed onto its roof and ended up on the central reservation of the m1 at j45-j44 .
currently it 's still down to one lane in both directions with long tailbacks .
highways england are repairing the barrier
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: travel update : problems around garforth
text: this is the knock-on from the m1 accident :
traffic still at a standstill round # garforth # micklefield # m1
major traffic problems around # leeds this morning .
help us help others , tell us where you are if it 's safe & legal
you can not get out of rothwell in any direction .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: travel update : problems on m1 and m62
text: we 've been telling you about the accident on the m1 , now it seems there could be more problems on the m62 westbound :
reports coming in of a 3 vehicle rtc on m62 junction 30 west bound .
please take care if in the area .
incident 332 refers .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: latest update from m1
text: this morning an accident on the m1 has been causing some major delays around leeds .
the road is down to just one lane both north and southbound .
there are ten miles of queues northbound , and if you 're heading southbound you can expect an hour 's delay .
many drivers are telling us saying they 've not moved far at all in the last hour .
the delays are due to an accident , where a car has overturned on the central reservation and is also causing problems around garforth .

documents.title: travel updates : major problems on routes around leeds
text: the accident on the m1 is causing gridlock around leeds this morning , people are taking to twitter to tell us about it .
help us build up a of how bad it is where you are , you can tweet us here or you can drop us a line on email .
but only if it 's safe and legal to do so .
travel : big problems on the # m1 this morning which is also affecting # m62 .
# leeds # wakefield # sheffield
we 've moved about 10m in just over an hour .

documents.title: travel update : problems continue on the m1
text: there 's no good news about the m1 , i 'm afraid , where there are still long delays at the moment :
contractors making safe barrier+lighting column after collision today involving overturned car .
working to get more lanes open # m1 j44 - j45
thats what happens when some idiot is doing 120mph ! ! ! !
in bad driving conditions
why put 40mph signs up when it 's pretty evident that the mway is stood still for 7 miles !
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: lindsay rimer death : man arrested over 1990s case bailed
text: a man arrested on sus of the murder of a teenager in the 1990s has been released on police bail .
lindsay rimer , 13 , was last seen at a shop in hebden bridge on 7 november 1994 .
her body was found in the rochdale canal a mile from the town centre in april 1995 .
a 63-year-old man from bradford was arrested on tuesday .
detectives had been given a 24-hour extension to question him .

documents.title: travel update : problems on the m1
text: we 've just heard that the northbound carriageway on the m1 at j45-j44 has been partially reopened but is still down to one lane .
travel time is at least 30mins .
if you 're heading southbound , there 's still only one lane open and .
you can expect a delay of 70 mins .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: travel update : problems on the m62
text: that accident on the m1 looks like it 's also affecting the m62 eastbound too .
this is a queue that stretches from leeds to brighouse .
that 's from j25 to j27 :
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: travel : problems on the m1
text: here 's that accident on the m1 in more detail .
the northbound carriageway is completely closed northbound .
on the southbound side , we have two lanes closed .
it 's because of an overturned car between j44 and j45 which has gone across both carriageways .
northbound there are queues to j42 and south to j47 .
here is the queue where the m1 and the m621 split :
author: BBC Travel

text: it 's a cold and wet start , but what does the rest of the day hold in store ?
check out my full forecast below :
author: Owain Wyn Evans
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: hello and welcome to our live coverage of news , sport , weather and travel , i 'll be here until 18:00 .
a quick look at the weather reveals that we 're going to reach a mighty high of 7c ( 44f ) .
but it 's bad news on the m1 this morning : it 's closed between j45 and j44 because of an overturned car that has blocked both carriageways .
this is the queue northbound just before j42 :
author: Nick Wilmshurst
BBC Local Live, Leeds
